Lunarpine decides that his missions to important to trust any other
Maximals. (My posts are being ignored anyway.) so he proceeds to the
transport pod he'd arrived in and set a course for Norway. The computer
warns him "Present course will take you into Predacon territory. do you wish
to correct?" The wolfbot pondered the question for a moment, "No correction,
use current flight path." the transport pod raised into the air and began
it's flight to Norway.
